alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:18PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette and northwestern Pontotoc Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Denmark, or 8 miles southeast of Oxford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tula, Denmark, Thaxton, Toccopola, Altus, Lafayette Springs, Delay and Yocona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
